core:executeProcessAction.core:comment: Perform address lookup on this computer.

core:action.core:comment: Event to signify that the address lookup was successful with an exact match.
Event to signify that the address lookup failed.
Event to signify that the address lookup was successful but there were no matches.
Event to signify that the address lookup was successful but there were multiple matches.
Event to signify that the address lookup was successful but there were too many matches to list.

core:endProcessAction.core:comment: An error occurred during the address lookup.
The lookup was executed without error and one address was matched.
The lookup was executed without error but no matches were found.
The lookup was executed without error but multiple matches were found.
The lookup was executed without error but too many matches were found to be returned.

core:action.core:comment: Invokes a web service with given message entity and the service URL.
Invokes a web service with given message entity and the service URL.
